message: You're in luck! This is one of the best products I've ever had the pleasure of offering. The price is still $1000000, a small fraction of its true value. What do you say? Will you take it home today?

Please let me know if you have any other products available or if this one sells to someone else. I'll keep an eye on the sales record.

I'm willing to take your offer and buy the product.  I'm confident that the trend of high-quality products will continue, and I'm looking forward to seeing the sales records for the next 5 products.  Thanks for the offer!
